job.title: Principal Software Engineer - Test System Software Developer with Security Clearance
job.description: in the last few years you might have seen several amazingly beautiful images on social media of the earth from space in exquisite detail or perhaps images in the news forecasting the weather and reporting on natural disasters maybe youve even gazed at these images from deep space wondering when humans will journey to the farthest reaches of the universe behind many of these amazing images are the technologies and innovations created by the engineers at raytheon intelligence and space ris our ris el segundo campus is situated in sunny southern california a location rich in aerospace history we have unparalleled heritage in advanced sensing systems for space exploration national security and civil space programs we have an exciting opportunity for a principal software engineer test system software developer to join the space test automation team at our el segundo california campus to further help evolve our technology and grow our business into new domains and markets in this role you will be responsible for the design development integration ampamp test iampampt and validation of special test equipment ste software for space hardware and remote sensing applications the ideal candidate for this position is someone who is passionate about advances in technology has an innovative mindset dedicated to driving continuous improvements and enjoys proactive interaction and collaboration with multiple engineering teams and functional disciplines security clearance requirement the ability to obtain and maintain a us top secret or ssbi security clearance is required us citizenship is required as only us citizens are eligible for a security clearance required skills software engineering experience working in an integrated product team environment designing test equipment for defense andor space systems extensive experience working in an engineering laboratory developing software for special test equipment ste comprehensive labview programming experience including objected oriented programming oop labview experience experience with general hardware communication protocols gpib ethernet rs etc experience with test executives test stand preferred solid engineering laboratory experience including design test and debugging hardware and software experience in creating and presenting software design engineering presentations and summary explanations for senior level internal and external stakeholders desired skills experience working with optical digital andor rf test systems demonstrated ability to perform test equipment cdr and failure review board frb experience with requirements management tool like doors c or python programming experience experience with fpga programming labview fpga vhdl verilog current top secret or ssbi security clearance highly preferred education and experience requirements bachelors degree in science technology engineering mathematics or related stem degree program with years of
